content: DD-WMS 100 Seal Seal for the DD-WCS water collector system ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Drill stand mounted water collectors- ### FEATURES:Features Designed for fast and simple replacement of damaged seals Helps to ensure a secure hold on the wall using only vacuum suction Applications Replacement seal sets for the DD-WCS self-securing water collector system ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Sealing washers Technical Data | Accessory type | Water collector systems | For use with | DD 160, DD 200, DD 250, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA ### ITEMS- 2166106 - Water collection ring seal set WCS 67 - Package Size 1 pc - 2166107 - Water collection ring seal set WCS 122 - Package Size 1 pc - 2166108 - Seal DD-WCS-142 set - Package Size 1 pc - 2166109 - Water collection ring seal set WCS 172 - Package Size 1 pc - 2166200 - Water collection ring seal set WCS 250 - Package Size 1 pc
